name: MasqueradeAI
description:
In this card game, players select and place the cards prior to a battle.
The biggest feature of the game is that all actions in a battle are performed automatically, with players having to do nothing but to accept fate.

The order that cards act depend on their "Agility" --- something that can change when "Skills" are used.
The game may therefore see a big twist during the game, which is ever so intriguing!
